summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Chapter 23.32 of the Seattle Municipal Code at page 102 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone property located at 711 Bellevue Avenue East from Lowrise 3 (LR3) to Midrise with a 60 foot height limit (MR-60), and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition by Lesley Bain, C.F. 310211, DPD Project 3010378)
